divs: sighting detailson the morning of 10\22\82 7:30 a.m. i awoke to a real sighting of an unknown object which was over my floor in front of my bed to the left. it was aprox. 10"w x 18"h cyclinder shaped, rotating its mass of small round, different sized shapes at an extremely fast speed in a clock wise direction, colored in blues and greens, creating a loud humming sound. this was a starting experience to come in contact with while i was awake and watching it from my bed in total amazement. i almost could not believe this was happening, before my very eyes and ears. i was looking at something that was spinning with centrifugal force that i could not explain. after viewing it for some time i gave myself a reality check and pinched myself. after i realized it was real, beautiful and bizzare i did not know what it was there for or what to do so i walked along the right wall into the next room, the bathroom and i could still hear the humming loud sound it was making so i came out went into bed and watched some more untill it dissapeared. it did not scare me and it left me with tranquillity and joy. i actually believed immediately afterwards it came to heal me. aprox. 5 years later i was in a health food store and picked up a book called metaphysical meditations and by coincidence the first page i came to was page 35 titled "tune in with the cosmic sound" and read about aum for the first time in my life. then i realized what i saw was the cosmic force of the universe creating the aum sound which attuned my brain wave activity; which allowed me to feel hope, security, love, and a connection to god which i still have today.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hackensack
There were no other sightings in Hackensack on or around October 22nd 1982
Summary: Mass of blu-green small varied size atom shapes rotating very fast making loud humming sound.
